alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Henderson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 10:29PM EDT until April 01 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, and Shawneetown. .Recent heavy rainfall is resulting in rises on the Ohio River. The river is forecast to rise above flood stage at several locations. For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...From late Sunday night to Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 31.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 41.1 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
